abstract.text: An intent that contains information about media playable from your app.
Play media intent attributes
Siri phrases that trigger playing media
An intent that contains information about media playable from your app.
Initialize an intent that describes media content such as a song, podcast episode, or movie.
Initializes an intent that describes media content such as a song, podcast episode, or movie.
The media item container.
The media content.
A Boolean value that indicates whether the media plays in a shuffled order.
The resume playback setting at the time the user plays the media item.
The repeat mode setting at the time the user plays the media item.
The possible repeat modes at the time the user plays the media item.
The playback speed for a media item.
The queue location for a media item during playback.
Constants that describe the playback queue location for a media item.
An object that contains the search parameters.
The interface an object implements to confirm and handle play media intents.
An intents handler's response to a play media intent.

inlineContent.text: to donate songs, movies, and other media the user plays in your app, or to recommend upcoming media, such as new TV shows or podcast episodes. The system uses these donations to offer the user relevant search results and suggestions.
supports playing audio in the background. See
for more information about supporting background audio in your app.
lists additional attributes of this intent object.

abstract.text: Play media intent attributes

inlineContent.text: Users can ask Siri to play media in a variety of ways.
provides a few sample phrases in different languages. You can use these phrases during testing to trigger your intents. This list isn’t exhaustive and Siri may recognize many other phrases.
Put on the Conan O’Brien Needs a Friend podcast from <appName>
Play Moby Dick by Herman Melville using <appName>
在<appName>播放播客马力欧需要个朋友
用<appName>播放赫尔曼·梅尔维尔的白鲸
我想喺<appName>度聽播客Conan O’Brien 嘅Needs a Friend
從<appName>播放Podcast馬力歐陪你喝一杯
用<appName>播放赫爾曼·梅爾維爾的白鯨記
我想喺<appName>度听播客Conan O’Brien 嘅Needs a Friend
用<appName>播放赫尔曼麦尔维尔嘅白鲸记
